alert.note: Alert for Issaquena; Sharkey (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 03 at 5:56AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern East Carroll Parish, northwestern Issaquena and southern Sharkey Counties through 630 AM CST... At 556 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Alsatia, or near Transylvania, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Transylvania around 600 AM CST. Fitler and Onward around 610 AM CST. Rolling Fork around 620 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this storm include Mayersville and Cary. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CST for northeastern Louisiana...and northwestern and west central Mississippi.
